column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Go ahead , take your time , just bending a giant wall !
#Text=" Asami says : " What should we do ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " This is my hometown and I hate to say it , but there 's no use risking all our lives to fight that giant thing !
#Text=Let her take the city for now !
#Text=We 'll think of some way to come back and beat her !
#Text=" Mako says : " What about all the people who have n't been evacuated yet ?
#Text=If Kuvira finds out that Wu is with them , she might fire that spirit cannon at him and take them all out .
#Text=" Korra says : " I could n't stop Kuvira from taking Zaofu .
#Text=I 'm not letting her conquer Republic City .
#Text=The world is n't safe as long as she has that weapon .
#Text=" Lin says : " I agree .
#Text=We take down that giant today .
#Text=" Korra says : " Lin !
#Text=" Lin says : " Glad to see you all made it out .
#Text=You had me worried .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Well , you benders are going to have to fight her alone .
#Text=She just blew up our factory with all our hummingbird suits .
#Text=" Asami says : " Not all of them .
#Text=There are the prototypes back at my office .
#Text=If we can get those ready to fly , we 'll at least be able to offer a little air support .
#Text=" Korra says : " Su , you take Baatar Jr. and the rest of the wounded back to Asami 's office .
#Text=Get those suits working as soon as you can .
#Text=The rest of us will just have to face Kuvira on our own .
#Text="
